document_data.mainbody:
he Branded, or abd Wusum, were located in the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire.
The efreet mamluks of the Branded guarded the Sultans personal harim. There were 150 members of the Branded. All were known to be discreet and observant individuals who were immune to bribery attempts.
The City of Brass served as the base of the Branded.
